title.rendered: ClinLab wins FRAXA Biotech Games, fun for a great cause

content.rendered:
On Thursday, September 20, 2018 teams from 42 Boston area biotechs matched up for some serious lawn games including Cornhole, KanJam, Bucketball and Ladder golf at the very first FRAXA Biotech Games. According to the FRAXA Research Foundation, the event raised more than $30,000 for research at the MIT Bear Lab.

ClinLab won the day this year and hope to see more people supporting fraxa.org ?in the years to come. It was an amazing event and we can’t wait to participate again in 2019.
